about_the_game:
The soundtrack to the roguelike metroidvania, A Robot Named Fight.

This soundtrack will be updated if and when more music is added to the game via updates or DLC.

Tracklist

1. Something Forgotten and Terrible 01:09
2. A Robot Named Fight 02:56
3. The New Fight 02:43
4. Artifacts of Wartime 02:17
5. Meat Awaits 0:59
6. Boss Fight 02:21
7. The Caves 02:54
8. The Factory 04:22
9. The Buried City 03:19
10. The Megabeast 04:59
11. The Gut of the Beast 02:51
12. The Mission 02:15
13. A Forbidden Place 7:48
14. My Name is Death 4:40
15. The Forest Slums 4:03

Created solely by Matt Bitner
